  2. User Interface Design
  3. Page 2

Rationale for Skill

  • The user interface design is one of the most important aspects of software designing, it is the first layer ( namely view) of the application with which the user interacts.
  • The goals of user interface design are to make sytem usuable by : enagaging user, making system efficient, making system error tolerant, making system effective.

Roles for Skill

  • UI Designer
  • UX Designer

Work Related to Skill (Related Activities and Artifacts)

  1. User Interface requirements gathering.
  2. Build a prototype of actual software to be developed and verify the requirements and re-evaluate the requirements.
  3. Build the interface components.
  4. Test the components.

Real-World Example/Scenario of Skill (Text, Graphic, Audio, Video)

  1. Twitter Bootstrap - https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.5/examples/ - Build beautiful products, faster.
  2. UX Lessons from UI of Facebook, Twitter and LinkedInhttps://www.martechadvisor.com/articles/content-marketing/5-ux-lessons-from-the-ui-of-facebook-twitter-and-linkedin/

  3. 20 Excellent UI/UX Design Animation Examples
